headline 1: Coldplay set to shatter Taylor Swifts record in 2025

The second man from the left is wearing a black jacket with a colorful patch on the left shoulder and a graphic design on his shirt. The third man from the left has short hair and is wearing a black jacket with a zipper detail. The man on the far right is wearing a white t-shirt with a graphic design on the front. The focus is on the woman, capturing her in the spotlight, which highlights her as the main subject of the image.
